title: World Bank to support Bosnia's energy transition with $90.7 million loan
description:
SARAJEVO (Reuters) -The World Bank has approved a $90.7 million loan to support Bosnia and Herzegovina's "just transition" to renewable energy in former coal regions under the Balkan's country's national energy and climate plan, the bank said on Monday.

The bank's Board of Executive Directors also ...

title: Banks in BiH expect increased loan demand in the fourth quarter of 2025
description: SARAJEVO, November 27 (FENA) – Corporate demand for loans continued to grow in the third quarter of 2025, according to the Central Bank of Bosnia and Herzegovina’s survey on bank lending activity in the country.

title: EU and ILO Support Helps Bosnian Entrepreneur Build a Successful Natural Juice Brand
description: When Biljana Topić, a biologist and ornithologist from the small town of Šipovo in western Bosnia and Herzegovina, signed up for the International Labour Organization’s Start and Improve Your Business (SIYB) training, she had a dream — but no roadmap. Today, that dream has become a fully registered ...

title: EBRD and EU provide further support for SMEs in Bosnia and Herzegovina
description: Sarajevo [Bosnia and Herzegovina], October 17 (ANI/FENA): The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) is extending a loan of up to Euro 5 million to Sparkasse Bank dd in Bosnia and Herzegovina to boost the competitiveness of small local businesses. title: EBRD extends 2 mln euro loan to Bosnia's Addiko Bank to back SMEs
India, Bosnia and Herzegovina hold 4th foreign office consultations, strengthen bilateral ties
description:
Sarajevo [Bosnia and Herzegovina], November 29 (ANI): India and Bosnia and Herzegovina held their fourth Foreign Office Consultations (FOC) in Sarajevo on Thursday, as announced by the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA).

According to the MEA, The Indian delegation was led by Arun Kumar Sahu, Additi...

title: RBI: Interest rates are unlikely to go any lower, signals RBI
description: MUMBAI: The Reserve Bank of India RBI ) on Wednesday indicated that interest rates have bottomed out and yields are inching up in debt instruments as well as deposits, in clear indications that there may not be any rate cuts in the near future.“Scheduled commercial banks have effected complete pass-...

title: RBI Monetary Policy: RBI retains inflation forecast for FY24 at 5.4 per cent
description:
The Reserve Bank on Friday retained the inflation forecast for 2023-24 at 5.4 per cent, and vowed to take timely measures to prevent any spillovers of global food and fuel price shocks.

Stressing that the Reserve Bank has identified high inflation as a major risk to macroeconomic stability and sust...

title: Najnovije vijesti iz BiH, regiona i svijeta
Nature-Inspired Enterprise Thrives in Rural Bosnia
description: After completing the ILO "Start and Improve Your Business" (SIYB) training this year, Biljana Topić, a biologist and ornithologist from the small town of Šipovo, in western Bosnia and Herzegovina, learnt how to turn her idea into a viable enterprise.
